sentences.sContent: Contact lenses were once thought to be eyeglass killers.
sentences.sContent_eng: Contact lenses were once thought to be eyeglass killers.
sentences.sCn: 隐形眼镜一度被认为是普通眼镜的杀手。

sentences.sContent: Some of the tycoons that skipped town including Hu Fulin owner of Zhejiang Center Group a major eyeglass maker were convinced or coerced into coming back.
sentences.sContent_eng: Some of the tycoons that skipped town including Hu Fulin owner of Zhejiang Center Group a major eyeglass maker were convinced or coerced into coming back.
sentences.sCn: 一些失踪的企业主，包括胡福林（音），浙江中心集团（一家主要的镜片制造商）的老板，在劝说或强迫之下返回了企业。

trans.tranOther: a lens for one eye, worn to help you see better with that eye
